structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 71, effective January 1, 2010. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 86, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 276, effective June 17, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1884.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Special bond of sheriff for county levy -- Minimum -- Record.
